project.html:
A Blog Is Born

Finally, I made this very first project of this project-list I want to make myself progress, so I build thsi place to put my projects/output

About this blog, I put all whatever I want to write, whatever I've learned, whatever I want to do maybe there would not have reaaly much responses but I will keep writing something Hope myself could have a little more progress day by day

If anyone has interested in the history of this blog You can find the change in here I recordde version and what I've changed

Happy coding üëã
